name: Wingman DX
description:
Wingman Director’s Cut is a dating simulator where you play as a human Teacher’s Assistant on scholarship at the prestigious Wing Academy for the Soon-to-Be-Delicious. In a world where Wings are trying to find their one true Soulmouth, you’ve been hired to help teach Wings how to become more attractive and delicious to humans. Will you make lifelong friends, help them solve their problems, and find a date to the dance?

FEATURING:

  • -Gorgeous character art
  • -Comparatively shitty background art
  • -14 hot wings to date and 29 endings!
  • -Original music and voice acting!
  • -Classic Wingman and Alternate humanoid mode!
  • -Achievements!

Follow us and tell us what you think at @wingmanthegame on Tumblr, Twitter, and Instagram!
